docs.lead_paragraph: European Union residents would be able to receive most health care treatment anywhere in the 27-nation bloc without prior authorization under a proposal published on Wednesday.

docs.lead_paragraph: FACING JUSTICE Samuel Israel III, below, the fugitive hedge fund manager, turned himself in to authorities in Southwick, Mass., after faking his suicide last month while on his way to serve a prison sentence for defrauding investors out of $450 million. DETROIT CUTBACKS The leading American automakers plan to temporarily lay off 25,000 workers this summer and fall, but are still obligated to pay them more than half of their pay. [C1.]

docs.lead_paragraph: It could be a version of the ''Harry and Louise'' television commercial that helped kill Hillary Rodham Clinton's health care plan in 1994, only this time, it will be in favor of reform. A national advertisement by the newly formed group Health Care for America Now, to be released on Tuesday, will take on insurance companies and argue for comprehensive, affordable health care in the United States, a spokeswoman for the group said Wednesday.
docs.abstract: New group Health Care for America Now is set to take on insurance companies and argue for comprehensive health care in US; group plans to spend $40 million in advertising to promote affordable health care reform; photo (S)

docs.snippet: INTERNATIONAL     IRAQI OFFICIAL HINTS AT DELAY

docs.lead_paragraph: First, a confession. I have so far read only 299 of the 400 plus comments posted by readers on the first full day of this blog. I may be overwhelmed, but I also am so gratified at this outpouring of interest, commentary and suggestions, of tales of woe and sparks of wit. On this lonely journey, clearly we are not as alone as we feel.
docs.abstract: Your heartfelt stories, hundreds of them, help to set the agenda here.
docs.snippet: Your heartfelt stories, hundreds of them, help to set the agenda here.

docs.lead_paragraph: Most of New York City’s largest projects were hobbled by a strike by hundreds of cement-truck drivers.
